text:
[warn] (OS 64)The specified network name is no longer available.  : 
winnt_accept: Asynchronous AcceptEx failed.

This seems to occur every second in sets of three and then stops and repeats.

We have Apache connecting to JBOSS 3.0.7 unclustered.
creator: trobbins@uci.edu
chip@force-elite.com
text:
See The Notes here:
http://www.apache.org/dist/httpd/binaries/win32/#problems

Add these to your configuration file:
EnableSendfile Off
EnableMMAP Off
Win32DisableAcceptEx
